name: Briscola (Fabio Lopiano)
overview: Briscola is one of Italy's most popular games, together with Scopa and Tressette. A little-changed descendant of Brusquembille, the ancestor of Briscan and Bezique, Briscola is a Mediterranean trick-taking, Ace-Ten card game for one against the computer, played with a standard Italian 40-card deck.
